name: einfo
description: look up general NCBI Entrez database information

options.description: Print information on the specified Entrez database, as an XML eInfoResult document.
Print a plain-text list of all available Entrez databases.
Print just an XML-structured summary of fields in the specified database.
Print just an XML-structured summary of links to and from the specified database.
Print usage information, complete with samples of -fields and -links XML output.

tldr:
> Provides the number of records indexed in each field of a given database, the date of the last update of the database, and the available links from the database to other Entrez databases.
> More information: <https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK179288/>.

- Print all database names:

`einfo -dbs`

- Print all information of the protein database in XML format:

`einfo -db {{protein}}`

- Print all fields of the nuccore database:

`einfo -db {{nuccore}} -fields`

- Print all links of the protein database:

`einfo -db {{protein}} -links`
